document_data.name: Merk's Guide to Animal Husbandry
document_data.author: [[Merk]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Merk's Guide to Animal Husbandry''''' was a [[book]] on the topics of agriculture and farming, written and published sometime before the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: A copy of ''Merk's Guide'' could be found in the library of the dilapidated [[Wolover's Keep]] in the [[Veilstone Peaks]]. The fortification's past master was a mage committed to agriculture, whose library was filled with works on the similar topics in the mid-14{{th}} century DR.
